trans-unit.source: This is an ePUB (e-book) version of your book. It contains audio, so that new readers can listen as they read.
trans-unit.target: Hii ni tafsiri ya ePUB (e-book) ya kitabu chako.Ina sauti, ili wasomi waweze kusikiliza wanaposoma.

trans-unit.source: This book has some recordings, but this audio is not included in the ePUB.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kina baadhi ya rekodi, lakini sauti hii haijajumuishwa katika ePUB.

trans-unit.source: You can resize the preview by dragging the lower right corner of this simulated device. See how your book will look on screens of various sizes.
trans-unit.target: Unaweza kubadilisha ukubwa wakati wa kuonyesha kwa kuvuta pembe ya chini ya upande wa kulia wa kifaa hiki kilichoigizwa. Tazama jinsi kitabu chako kitakavyoonekana kwenye skrini za ukubwa tofauti.

trans-unit.source: This page uses the Readium ePUB reader. Books will likely look different on different readers.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa huu hutumia kifaa cha kusoma cha Readium ePUB. Huenda vitabu vikaonekana kuwa tofauti kwa wasomaji tofauti.

trans-unit.source: The preview here cannot yet play Talking Books. You can listen to it using Adobe's Free Digital Editions e-book reader.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuonyesha hapa, bado haitawezekana kucheza Vitabu vilivyo na Sauti. Unaweza kuisikiza kwa kutumia Digital Editions ya bure ya Adobe. Kifaa cha kusoma e-book.

trans-unit.source: Getting this book onto your Device
trans-unit.target: Kuweka Kitabu Hiki Kwenye Kifaa Chako

trans-unit.source: A handy way to get books to your phone is to set up Dropbox or similar service on both your computer and your phone/tablet. Just click Save ePUB and then choose your Dropbox folder. On your phone, open the Dropbox app and select your book. If you are using a laptop, you can also try the free ShareIt program to send files from your laptop to a phone or tablet.
trans-unit.target: Njia nzuri ya kutia kitabu kwenye simu yako ni kwa kuweka Dropbox au huduma sawa kwenye kompyuta yako na simu/tableti yako. bofya hifadhi ePUB na kisha uchague jalada lako la Dropbox. Kwenye simu yako, fungua Dropbox na uchague kitabu. Iwapo unatumia kipakatalishi, pia unaweza kujaribu programu isiyolipishwa ya Shirikisha ili kutuma faili kutoka kwa kipakatalishi chako hadi kwa simu au tableti.

trans-unit.source: Our testing has shown Gitden Reader to be a good choice for Android and IOS (IPhone & IPad) devices.
trans-unit.target: Majaribio yetu yameonyesha Kifaa cha kusoma cha Gitden kuwa chaguo nzuri kwa vifaa vya Androidi na IOS (IPhoni & IPadi).

alt-trans.target: Majaribio yetu yameonyesha Kifaa cha kusoma cha Gitden kuwa chaguo nzuri kwa vifaa vya Androidi na IOS (IPhoni & IPadi).

trans-unit.source: To listen to this Talking Book using Gitden on a phone or tablet, you will need to disable Gitden's "Read aloud (TTS)" feature. Then it will show you the audio controls.
trans-unit.target: Ili kusikiza Vitabu hivi vilivyo na Sauti kwa kutumia Gitden kwenye simu au tableti, utahitajika kuzima sehemu ya Gitden ya "Maandishi Hadi Usemi". Kisha itakuelekeza kwenye udhibiti wa sauti.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (Gitden's wording changed): To listen to this Talking Book using Gitden on a phone or tablet, you will need to disable Gitden's "Text To Speech" feature. Then it will show you the audio controls.

trans-unit.source: If you want to make a "Talking Book" that new readers can read-along with, use Bloom's Talking Book Tool to add voice recordings.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo ungependa kutengeneza "Kitabu kilicho na sauti" ambacho wasomi wa mara ya kwanza wanaweza kutumia wanaposoma, tumia' Kifaa cha Kitabu kilicho na Sauti cha Bloom kuongeza sauti zilizorekodiwa.

trans-unit.source: Are you interested in distributing Bloom books for use on phones and other ebook readers? Is there something you would need us to do before it is useful for you? Please use the Help:Report A Problem command to send us feedback. Thanks!
trans-unit.target: Je, ungependa kusambaza vitabu vya Bloom vya kutumia kwa simu na kwenye vifaa vingine vya kusoma vya mtandao? Je, kuna jambo ambalo ungependa tufanye kwanza lililo la muhimu kwako? Tafadhali tumia Usaindizi:Ripoti Tatizo amrisha kututumia majibu. Asante!
